def valid_card(card):
    s = list(map(int, str(card.replace(' ', ''))))
    s[0::2] = [d * 2 - 9 if d * 2 > 9 else d * 2 for d in s[0::2]]
    return sum(s) % 10 == 0

def valid_card(card):    
    card=str(card.replace(' ',''))
    return (sum(map(int, str(card)[1::2])) + \
            sum(sum(map(int, str(i*2))) for i in \
            map(int, str(card)[0::2]))) % 10 == 0

def valid_card(card):
    return sum([2*c,2*c-9][2*c>9] if i%2 else c for i,c in enumerate(map(int,card.replace(" ","")[::-1])))%10==0
